resources.string:
Thank you for using my Healthcare AI App ("CareBot"). By accessing and using the App, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions:
Use of Information: The information provided by the App is for informational purposes only and should not be considered medical advice. Always consult a qualified healthcare professional for diagnosis and treatment.
Privacy: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and disclose your information.
Contact Us: If you have any questions or concerns about these terms and conditions, please contact us at 2013687@leedstrinity.ac.uk.
By using the App, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.
